    • Method Detail

      • getMagic

        public java.lang.String getMagic()
                          throws RegistryParseException
        getMagic fetches the magic bytes that determine this Record's type. Return value is a string, because for all known Record types, the magic values falls within the ASCII range.
        Returns:
        A two character string that is the magic record header.
        Throws:
        RegistryParseException - if the magic header is a two byte ASCII string.
